title: may 24: the cicadas are coming! the cicadas are coming!
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the Brood IX cicadas, millions upon millions of which emerged in Virginia, North Carolina and West Virginia in 2020 after 17 years underground. After, she reflects on the 1997 Spice Girls album, Spice, hitting #1 in the US. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
